snippet: On Monday, Japan’s benchmark soared 7.2 percent, to post its second biggest one-day gain in three years, which led to big gains in Europe.
abstract: World stocks rise, aided by jump in Japan's main Nikkei 225 index.
lead_paragraph: On Monday, Japan’s benchmark soared 7.2 percent, to post its second biggest one-day gain in three years, which led to big gains in Europe.

headline.print_headline: Global Shares Buoyed by Investor Faith
headline.main: Global Stocks Buoyed by Investor Faith
